plugins.name: JSON -> Swatches
plugins.description:
Turn JSON into color swatches in Figma sorted by color.


Each swatch includes the color name (if given) as well as Hex and opacity values.


You can add an optional tag for extra detail if/when importing multiple libraries.


Auditing an existing design system? JSON -> Swatches is a great tool for mapping old color libraries to new.

plugins.name: Inked Colibri (RTC Converter and More)
plugins.description:
"Enhance your design workflow with a powerful plugin that converts Realtime Colors into Figma variables. Generate stunning color schemes, manage variables, and ensure contrast compliance with APCA standards. Features include interactive color pairing visualization, CSS variable export, and seamless theme synchronization."

https://youtu.be/H7M28NFhJ14


Core Features


Color Scheme Management

  1. Generate color schemes: monochromatic, analogous, complementary, and more.
  2. Randomize colors with support for multiple schemes.
  3. Enable real-time color updates and synchronization.
  4. Perform APCA contrast calculations and validation.


Matrix Generation

  1. Generate three matrix types: huge, compact, and slim.
  2. Create alpha-based color matrices.
  3. Visualize APCA contrast and validate thresholds.
  4. Customize thresholds and interactively visualize color pairings.


Variable Management

  1. Create and update color variables.
  2. Convert styles bi-directionally.
  3. Export variables as CSS.
  4. Generate and visualize swatches.
  5. Synchronize themes seamlessly.
plugins.tagline: Convert Realtime Colors to Variables, ensure APCA Accessibility, generate schemes, and more!

plugins.name: FlipArabic
plugins.description:
Flip frames, change fonts, and translate copy for Arabic layouts. All with one click.

Let FlipArabic handle localization so you can focus on crafting great experiences.


Made for Your Workflow

  1. Save Time - No hours wasted on manual mirroring or font hunting.
  2. Zero Learning Curve - Select a frame or whole sections for multiple frames and convert!
  3. No Details Lost - Padding, nested auto-layouts, absolute elements, and constraints are all taken care of.
  4. Built-in Translation - AI-powered translation that keeps copy in context (big updates coming in this space).
  5. Smart Font Swapping - Auto-matches weights & styles when exact alternatives aren't available.
  6. Smart Skip for Visuals - Icons, logos, shapes, SVGs & flags keep their original direction.


Fine Tune Your Conversion

  1. Add df or don't flip to layer names to skip flipping
  2. Add dfc or don't flip content to frame names to flip position but keep contents unchanged
  3. Add dt or don't translate to text layer names to keep specific text in English
  4. Add dtc or don't translate content to parent frame names to preserve entire text blocks


For support, ideas or general feedback, reach out to fliparabic@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs to Arabic instantly. Flip, change fonts & translate in one click.

- Better handling of grid layouts with wrapping

## üéØ Core Features

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line and paragraph text, applying the optimal line height multiplier for each.

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all selected text layers for precise typographic control.

## ‚ú® Use Cases

- Quickly unify text line height across your design

- Improve readability: tighter single-line headings, more breathable paragraph spacing

- Batch-adjust text layouts across multiple pages

plugins.name: WCAG Contrast Auditor
plugins.description:
WCAG Contrast Auditor is a Figma plugin that helps you guarantee your text meets WCAG accessibility standards‚Äîno manual math or guesswork required. Simply:


  1. Select the text layers you want to check (or select a parent frame to audit everything inside).
  2. Pick your background color and target WCAG level (AA or AAA).
  3. Run Audit to instantly see how many layers pass or fail the chosen contrast threshold.


Key benefits:

  1. Automated compliance checks: Scan dozens or hundreds of text layers in seconds.
  2. Flexible thresholds: Choose between WCAG AA (4.5:1) or AAA (7:1) contrast ratios.
  3. Lightweight & zero setup: No external dependencies‚Äîjust install and go.
  4. Actionable results: Get a quick pass/fail count so you know exactly where to focus your fixes.


Whether you‚Äôre building design systems, client deliverables, or internal UIs, WCAG Contrast Auditor makes accessibility a seamless, one-click step in your workflow. Ensure every color combination is compliant‚Äîand ship more inclusive products today!
plugins.tagline: Spot & Fix WCAG Contrast Issues Instantly.

plugins.name: Text & Color to CSS Variables
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you generate clean, reusable CSS variables from selected Figma layers.

It supports both text styles and fill colors, and automatically converts them into:


@mixin snippets for font styles


:root CSS variables for color values (in HEX format)


Auto-detects color types like color-gray, color-blue, color-red, etc.


Prevents name duplication with numbered suffixes (e.g., --color-gray-1, --color-gray-2)


Sorts all variables in ascending order for better readability


Perfect for building design systems or exporting ready-to-use CSS from design files.
plugins.tagline: Extract text styles and fill colors from Figma layers and convert them into organized CSS variables.

plugins.name: Skeema
plugins.description:
What is Skeema?

Skeema is a Figma plugin that integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. It allows frontend developers and designers to access API schemas for specific design components, making it easier to align designs with backend structures and speed up the development process.


How does Skeema work?

It connects your Figma designs to the relevant API documentation. By clicking on a design element, you can instantly view the associated endpoint documentation, eliminating the need to search through long API docs.


Who is Skeema for?

This plugin is designed for frontend and backend developers, and teams who work with API-driven applications. It helps bridge the gap between design and development, making UI-based API integration and collaboration smoother and more efficient.


What are the key benefits of using Skeema?

  1. üöÄ Faster API integration: No more switching between tools. Get API docs directly inside Figma.
  2. üéØ Better accuracy: Ensure your design components match the API structures, reducing development errors.
  3. üë©‚Äçüíª Streamlined collaboration: Designers and developers stay aligned, minimizing back-and-forth communication.


Do I need technical skills to use Skeema?

While Skeema is built with developers in mind, it's intuitive enough for designers to use as well. Its UI is designed to seamlessly integrate into your existing Figma workflow, making it accessible for anyone involved in the design and development process.


What APIs does Skeema support?

Skeema is designed to work with OpenAPI (Swagger) specifications, but it can support a wide range of RESTful APIs. As long as your API has proper documentation, Skeema can link it to your Figma designs.


Is Skeema free?

Skeema offers both a free version with basic features and a premium version with advanced features such as team collaboration, extended API support, and priority access to updates.


Can I use Skeema with my team?

Yes! Skeema is built for collaborative teams. You can easily share API-linked designs with your development team, ensuring that everyone stays on the same page and works with the latest API documentation.
plugins.tagline: Skeema integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. Simply click to view docs.

plugins.name: Offgrid.fm
plugins.description:
Offgrid.fm is a lightweight Figma plugin that quietly monitors your design canvas and alerts you when someone is viewing your work without interacting. Whether you're collaborating on sensitive projects or just want more visibility into your workspace and helps you stay in control.


Key Features:

  1. Real-time detection of inactive observers
  2. Instantly identifies who's viewing your designs
  3. Helps protect your creative privacy and intellectual property
  4. Runs silently in the background without disrupting your workflow


Currently supports the Figma Web App only. *


Ideal for designers handling confidential work, remote teams, and creatives who value situational awareness in collaborative environments.
plugins.tagline: You've got eyes on you üëÄ

plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

By providing a suite of powerful text manipulation features such as one-click extraction, batch replacement, precise filtering, and flexible insertion, it significantly boosts productivity. plugins.name: Little Bro
plugins.description:
Your Personal Design Mentor for Growth, Confidence, and Impact

Little Bro is the ultimate tool for designers who want to elevate their craft and make a real impact. Whether you're a junior designer, freelancer, or aspiring creative, Little Bro provides the mentorship and tools you need to thrive in your design journey.


  1. Instant Feedback on UX and Usability: Get real-time insights into your designs with usability simulations that help you identify pain points and improve user satisfaction.
  2. Accessibility Standards Made Simple: Ensure your designs are inclusive and meet accessibility standards effortlessly, making your work usable for everyone.
  3. Overcome Creative Blocks: Stay inspired and productive with strategies to spark creativity and keep your projects moving forward.
  4. Refine Your Presentation Skills: Learn to articulate your design decisions with clarity and confidence, helping you win over clients, teams, and stakeholders.
  5. Continuous Skill Development: With guidance refined by senior, staff, and director-level UI/UX and product designers, Little Bro helps you grow into the confident, skilled designer you aspire to be.


Little Bro is more than just a tool‚Äîit's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.


Join a community of designers transforming their careers with Little Bro and unlock your full potential today.
plugins.tagline: A companion to help you design better, faster, and smarter

plugins.name: DATVM
plugins.description:
DATVM makes it simple to inject realistic and varied data directly into your Figma designs, saving you time and keeping your mockups authentic.


100+ Built-in Datasets

Choose from a wide range of pre-populated categories.


Customizable Lists

Create and manage your own custom lists to perfectly match your project's specific needs.


Sort & Randomize

Sort data alphabetically, by length, or randomize for unique content every time.


Number Formatting

Format numbers with precision. Control decimal places, separators, currency symbols, and percentage variations.


Date Formatting

Easily format dates with customizable separators and order.


Bookmarks

Save your favorite lists for quick and easy access.


How it Works

  1. Select the text layers you want to populate.
  2. Open DATVM.
  3. Choose a data category from the available lists or select a custom list.
  4. Customize formatting options.
  5. Click to populate the selected layers with data.
plugins.tagline: Finest Data Populator

plugins.name: AVA Companion Plugin
plugins.description:
The AvaHub Batch Crop Importer plugin simplifies the design workflow by seamlessly importing crops generated by AvaHub.ai directly into Figma. AvaHub generates precise image crops, and this plugin allows you to batch import them effortlessly into your Figma workspace.


Simply upload the JSON file generated by AvaHub, and this plugin will take care of the rest, preparing all your crops for use in your Figma designs. Ideal for designers who work with dynamic content or need to quickly integrate various image assets.
plugins.tagline: A tool to batch crop your ava images

plugins.name: OxyReIcon
plugins.description:
OxyReIcon is the ultimate Figma plugin for designers and icon creators who want to streamline their workflow and create consistent, professional-looking icon sets effortlessly.


Key Features:

  1. Instantly create frames around your vector icons
  2. Customize background and icon colors with opacity control
  3. Automatically align icons in a customizable grid layout
  4. Resize icons and frames with precise control
  5. Convert framed icons back to vectors with a single click
  6. Save and load your preferred settings for quick access


Whether you're creating a comprehensive icon library, designing a cohesive UI, or preparing assets for development handoff, OxyReIcon has got you covered. Say goodbye to manual resizing and positioning ‚Äì let our plugin do the heavy lifting so you can focus on what matters most: designing great icons.
plugins.tagline: Transform your vector icons into perfectly styled, grid-aligned frames in seconds.

plugins.name: Mendly ‚Äî Merge & Fix Broken Variables
plugins.description:
**Streamline your design system maintenance with powerful variable management tools.**


## Key Features


**üîÑ Smart Variable Merging**

- Combine duplicate color variables into one

- Automatically updates all references throughout your design

- Preserves semantic variable relationships

- Optional renaming during merge process


**üîß Broken Variable Detection & Repair**

- Scans current page for broken variable references

- Smart suggestions based on variable naming patterns

- Navigate between elements using the same broken variable

- Batch fix multiple variables at once


**‚ö° Intelligent Analysis**

- Shows direct vs semantic variable usage

- Counts affected elements before merging

- Identifies variable dependencies

- Context-aware replacement suggestions


**üéØ Perfect For**

- Design system cleanup and maintenance

- Removing duplicate variables after design updates

- Fixing broken references after variable deletions

- Streamlining color variable organization


**üí° How It Works**

1. Select source variable (will be removed) and target variable (will remain)

2. Preview affected elements and usage statistics

3. Merge variables with one click - all references automatically update

4. Use the fix tool to repair any broken variable links


Save hours of manual work and keep your design system clean and organized!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly merge duplicate variables and fix broken references in your design system.
